title: Turing Machines: A Simple Explanation with an Exam
prompt: Explain the concept of Turing Machines with a simple example.
preview: markdown Welcome to the Turing Machine Speech Hey everyone! Today, I want to take you on a journey through one of the most elegant ideas in all of computer science—the Turing Machine.
